name: Global.Pattern.Architecture.ServiceLayer
observations: Encapsulate business logic in service classes

name: Global.Pattern.Architecture.Repository
observations: Abstract data access behind repository interface

name: Global.Pattern.Architecture.DependencyInjection
observations: Inject dependencies rather than creating them

name: Global.Pattern.ErrorHandling.CategorizedErrors
observations: Categorize errors by type for appropriate handling

name: Global.Pattern.Testing.AAA
observations: Clear separation of setup, execution, verification

name: Global.Pattern.Testing.UnitIsolation
observations: No shared state, no order dependency

name: Global.Pattern.API.RESTful
observations: Resource-based URLs, HTTP verbs for actions
GET read, POST create, PUT update, DELETE remove

name: Global.Pattern.Security.JWTAuth
observations: JSON Web Tokens for stateless authentication

name: Global.Pattern.Design.Strategy
observations: Define family of algorithms, make interchangeable
Useful for multiple implementations of same interface

name: Global.Pattern.Design.Factory
observations: Useful when creation is complex or conditional

name: Global.Pattern.Design.Observer
observations: One-to-many dependency, notify on state change

name: Global.Pattern.Code.SingleResponsibility
observations: Each class/function has one reason to change

name: Global.Pattern.Code.DRY
observations: Extract common logic to reusable functions

name: Global.Pattern.API.AsyncIO
observations: FastAPI with async database and network calls

name: Global.Pattern.API.WebSocketRealtime
observations: WebSocket for bidirectional real-time data streaming
Use for terminal sessions, live monitoring, traffic capture
Event-driven push model for immediate updates

name: Global.Pattern.API.BackgroundTasks
observations: FastAPI BackgroundTasks for async job processing
Return immediate response while processing continues
